name: CATS 2 | Frostfire
description:
C.A.T.S
Cat Agency Top Secret

The Evil Dog Empire has returned with a plan to defeat the Agency!
Explore Frostfire Island and shut down the Doomsday Dogbot before it is too late!

INSTRUCTIONS
Press WASD to move.
Don´t forget wall jumps (keep W pressed).
Press SPACE to place a bomb or firework.
Press S to jump off a platform.
